biotools.summary: PhEMD is a package for relating a network of single-cell samples. By first modeling the cell-state landscape of a model system and then computing pairwise distances between samples using EMD, PhEMD constructs a low-dimensional embedding that uncovers intrinsic manifold structure.

bioschemas.name: PhEMD
bioschemas.summary: PhEMD is a package for relating a network of single-cell samples. By first modeling the cell-state landscape of a model system and then computing pairwise distances between samples using EMD, PhEMD constructs a low-dimensional embedding that uncovers intrinsic manifold structure.
